mentionedBy.name: Nutanix Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: VMware's response to Nutanix, combining vSphere with software-defined storage (VSAN). EVO:RAIL was VMware's hyper-converged appliance program launched in 2014, while VSAN was the underlying storage virtualization technology.

2015.note: VMware's response to Nutanix, combining vSphere with software-defined storage (VSAN). EVO:RAIL was VMware's hyper-converged appliance program launched in 2014, while VSAN was the underlying storage virtualization technology.
